description:
Explore new routes without losing site of where you’re going. Mounting easily to your bike’s handlebar, a stroller’s grip, or practically anywhere designed for your hands, the Squeeze Rotating mount holds your phone securely. Whether you are popping your phone on a bike share bike on holiday for directions to dinner, a spin bike at the gym to watch a show, or just trying a new route to work, this mount will keep your phone right where you need it.

  • 360° rotation for portrait or landscape viewing
  • Pinch mounting system makes fits phones of all sizes, from 6-9cm wide
  • Rigid arms with grippy rubber pads and a non-slip foam panel hold your phone securely
  • Tool-free mounting bracket makes it fast to swap between bikes
  • Stretch mounting strap fits handlebars, stems, strollers, and more
  • Dimensions: 8.3 x 11 x 6cm
name: Nite Ize Squeeze Rotating Smartphone Bar Mount
